She smiled neveriously and walked to Roce Tower, holding out ehr 
hand. "Names Night Shade. Nice to be on the side that doesn't get 
their asses kicked everything they go out to fight."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Dragos looks " Check this out I now have a robot form Dragos 
transform"
> as Dragos turns into a ninja style Robot holding a sniper rifle Yes 
I am very Happy to have them back, Well we all are happy to back 
together. And yes the Preds should turn tail. Man it will be fun if 
we get into it." Dragos looks at Rock Tower "huh big guy." 
> Rock tower looks around " Yes it is going to be a fight that little 
will be standing." Rock towers grin seem to send shivers down peoples 
spines.
> Dragos seems to be the Physicaly smaller compared to the others. 
bout 5 feet tall. Rock tower is about 7 feet tall.
> 
> "amanda o." <lady_night_shade04@y...> wrote:
> Night Shade took a step back and looked at them each in turn, 
suddnly 
> very glad she turned Maximal. "Looks like the pred might have a 
> reason now to turn tail and run." She looked at the orginal 
two. "You 
> must be happy to have your friends back." She smiles slightly.
> 
>
